00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Multistep extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default {
00025 
00031         protected function parseSettings() {
00032                 session_start();
00033                 return $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'];
00034         }
00035         
00036         
00037         
00055         protected function fillDefaultMarkers() {
00056                 parent::fillDefaultMarkers();
00057                 $path = $this->pi_getPageLink($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00058                 $markers = array();
00059                 $markers['###REL_URL###'] = $path;
00060                 $markers['###ABS_URL###'] = t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl('').$path;
00061                 
00062                 session_start();
00063                 
00064                 // current step
00065                 $markers['###curStep###'] = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'];
00066                 
00067                 // maximum step/number of steps
00068                 $markers['###maxStep###'] = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['totalSteps'];
00069                 
00070                 // the last step shown
00071                 $markers['###lastStep###'] = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep'];
00072                 
00073                 $name = "step-";
00074                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']) {
00075                         $name = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']."[".$name."#step#]";
00076                 } else {
00077                         $name = "step-#step#";
00078                 }
00079                 
00080                 // submit name for next page
00081                 $markers['###submit_nextStep###'] = ' name="'.str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']+1),$name).'" ';
00082 
00083                 // submit name for previous page
00084                 $markers['###submit_prevStep###'] = ' name="'.str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']-1),$name).'" ';
00085 
00086                 // submit name for reloading the same page/step
00087                 $markers['###submit_reload###'] = ' name='.str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']),$name).'" ';
00088                 
00089                 // step bar
00090                 $markers['###step_bar###'] = $this->createStepBar(
00091                                                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'],
00092                                                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['totalSteps'],
00093                                                                                 str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']-1),$name),
00094                                                                                 str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']+1),$name)
00095                                                                          );
00096                 
00097                 
00098                 $this->addHiddenFields($markers);
00099                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00100                 
00101         }
00102         
00111         protected function addHiddenFields(&$markers) {
00112                 session_start();
00113                 $hiddenFields = "";
00114                 
00115                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'])) {
00116                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] as $step=>$params) {
00117                                 if($step != $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']) {
00118                                         foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00119                                                 $name = $key;
00120                                                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']) {
00121                                                         $name = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']."[".$key."]";
00122                                                 }
00123                                                 if(is_array($value)) {
00124                                                         foreach($value as $k=>$v) {
00125                                                                 
00126                                                                 $hiddenFields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$name.'[]" value="'.$v.'" />';
00127                                                         }
00128                                                 } else {
00129                                                         $hiddenFields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$name.'" value="'.$value.'" />';
00130                                                 }
00131                                         }
00132                                 }
00133                         }
00134                 }
00135                 $markers['###ADDITIONAL_MULTISTEP###'] = $hiddenFields;
00136         }
00137         
00149         protected function createStepBar($currentStep,$lastStep,$buttonNameBack ="",$buttonNameFwd ="") {
00150                 global $LANG;
00151                 
00152                 $bgcolor = '#c1d5ba';
00153                 if($this->errors) {
00154                         $bgcolor = '#dd7777';
00155                 }
00156                 $nrcolor = t3lib_div::modifyHTMLcolor($bgcolor,30,30,30);
00157 
00158                 $content='';
00159                 $buttons='';
00160 
00161                 for ($i = 1; $i <= $lastStep; $i++) {
00162                         $color = $nrcolor;
00163                         if($i == $currentStep) {
00164                                 $color = '#000';
00165                         }
00166                         $content.= '<span style="margin-left:5px; margin-right:5px; color:'.$color.';">'.$i.'</span>';
00167                 }
00168                 $content = '<span style="margin-left:50px; margin-right:25px; vertical-align:middle; font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica; font-size:22px; font-weight:bold;">'.$content.'</span>';
00169 
00170                 //if not the first step, show back button
00171                 if($currentStep > 1) {
00172                         $buttons .= '<input type="submit" name="'.$buttonNameBack.'" value="'.trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':'."back")).'" style="margin-right:10px;" />';
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 //if not the last step, show forward button
00176                 if($currentStep < $lastStep) {
00177                         $buttons .= '<input type="submit" name="'.$buttonNameFwd.'" value="'.trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':'."next")).'" />';
00178                 }
00179 
00180                 $content .= '<span id="stepsFormButtons" style="margin-left:25px;vertical-align:middle;">'.$buttons.'</span>';
00181                 $content = '<div style="padding:4px; border-bottom:1px solid #eee; background:'.$bgcolor.';">'.$content.'</div>';
00182 
00183                 return $content;
00184         }
00185

00187 }
